docs.lead_paragraph: His ideas and ideals are stamped on scores of laws and reflected in millions of lives -- in seniors who know new dignity, in families that know new opportunity, in children who know education's promise, and in all who can pursue their dream in an America that is more equal and more just -- including myself. PRESIDENT OBAMA on Senator Edward M. Kennedy. [A1]

docs.lead_paragraph: We’re finally making headway against childhood obesity. We can’t stop now.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by First Lady Michelle Obama warns that Congressional lawmakers are attempting to roll back reforms aimed at reducing obesity and improving nutrition among children and low-income people; points to proposals to change food requirements of Women, Infants and Children and school lunch programs even as reforms are beginning to show positive results.

headline.seo: Michelle Obama on Attempts to Roll Back Healthy Reforms

docs.snippet: We’re finally making headway against childhood obesity. We can’t stop now....
